General.Name: Asia Potash International Investment Guangzhou Co Ltd
General.Description: Asia-Potash International Investment (Guangzhou)Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, processing, production, and sale of potash fertilizers in China and internationally. It is also involved in the potash mining; research and promotion of potash technology; domestic trade, supply, and marketing of materials; import and export of goods and technologies; equity investment; and entrepot trade businesses. In addition, the company engages in the shipping of carrying bulk commodities, such as coal and iron ores; and provision of logistic activities. The company was formerly known as Donlinks International Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Asia-Potash International Investment (Guangzhou)Co.,Ltd. in September 2020. Asia-Potash International Investment (Guangzhou)Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
